title: The Magicians of Edinburgh
author: Butlin, Ron
snippet: Break the window to break into – what? Days and nights washed up on the Bridges, the Tron steps,in the Grassmarket, next to ATMs, Pizza Hut,St James Centre, Argos. Travelling always in the wrongto the wrong.

title: Tombstoning
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Christ, I could do with a serious piss-up, I haven't been hammered in a long, long time. These things happen when you're a responsible parent and you've got kiddies' parties and school uniforms and packed lunches and trips to see Shrek followed by your tea at Pizza Hut to worry about. But up in Arbroath next weekend I'll have my folks looking after Amy.
